hero.heading: Awaken Your Productivity
hero.paragraph: In everything we do, we believe in the productivity and coffee of Guatemala. Our coffee is gourmet because it comes from a single origin. We make it easy to order coffee for your home, business, or office.

supporting1.order_description: Enter your details and address to receive.
supporting1.mission_quote: “Our mission is simple: Help awaken the productivity of Guatemalans with our exclusive gourmet coffee.”

coffeeProducts.limited_offer: *LIMITED TIME ONLY: 2-for-1 on your first order + volume discounts + 2 wooden clip spoons
coffeeProducts.bonus: *BONUS: Start earning points from your first order with our Loyalty Program
coffeeProducts.guarantee: *GUARANTEE: With our 'Fresh or free' guarantee, if your coffee is not fresh, we will replace it at no extra cost

feature.heading_1: We Serve the Needs of Your Business or Office
feature.description_1: We offer special services and prices for wholesalers; take advantage of our special shipping rate.
feature.heading_2: Don Lucas Woke Up Every Day at 4 AM
feature.description_2: Stories say that Don Lucas and Doña Mary would wake up every day at 4 AM to work the fields, making each day productive and successful.
feature.heading_3: Committed to Supporting Education in Guatemala
feature.description_3: Every month we donate 10% of our profits to organizations that support education in Guatemala, aiming to help provide access to education in the country.

newsletter.heading: Subscribe to our newsletter and get a guide to boost productivity in your coffee consumption

testimonial.testimonial1_text: This coffee is absolutely delicious. It has an exquisite aroma and tastes mmmmmm.... I love it! 100% recommended!
testimonial.testimonial2_text: I love the atmosphere of the place, very cozy.
testimonial.testimonial3_text: The best coffee I've had in years.

referEarn.title: REFER AND EARN Q500
referEarn.description: Do you know any business or office that might be interested in our coffee? Refer us to your contact, you will earn Q500 and your referral will get 50% off on their first order.
